body_html:
should probably be ‘git pull —rebase upstream master’
…
On Tue, Jun 26, 2018 at 21:43 Soumith Chintala ***@***.***> wrote: @goodlux <https://github.com/goodlux> what you'd want to do is: git pull --rebase origin master to "merge upstream", rather than do git pull. It's an important thing to do to not see what you're seeing in this PR (lots of unrelated changes) — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
should probably be ‘git pull —rebase upstream master’

On Tue, Jun 26, 2018 at 21:43 Soumith Chintala <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @goodlux <https://github.com/goodlux> what you'd want to do is: git pull
> --rebase origin master to "merge upstream", rather than do git pull. It's
> an important thing to do to not see what you're seeing in this PR (lots of
> unrelated changes)
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
